WRITING.TITLE: How to Map Lead Generation to your Sales Funnel?
WRITING.TEXT: Every company have different revenue funnel. No two companies can have identical funnels. Strategies may be same but results will always be different. We are sharing market's funnel to reveal the different stages of the buyer's intent and campaigns.

WRITING.TITLE: Evolution in The Digital Marketing Funnel - Are You Ready?
WRITING.TEXT: Modern marketers know about market funnel which includes awareness, nurture, convert and delight. This idea of creating a sales funnel is more than hundred years old. The first purchase model is created in 1898. This model is followed by the marketers and the sales team.

WRITING.TITLE: What is Content Marketing Funnel And What Type of Content is Right For Each Stage of The Funnel
WRITING.TEXT: A small number of leads make it through the last stage of the funnel who finally turned into final customers. It is a system that can tap an infinite number of leads by following a step by step content flow.

WRITING.TITLE: What is The Difference Between Sales Funnel, Conversion Funnel And Marketing Funnel?
WRITING.TEXT: Businesses have divided sales and marketing into two different departments.Thus, two different journeys depict the progress of visitors and clients in terms of marketing or sales. Sales and marketing departments are integrating.

WRITING.TITLE: How to Set up B2b Lead Generation Funnel For Your Business?
WRITING.TEXT: B2B marketers face a problem of consistent leads for their business. Their marketing team put efforts to deliver quality leads to the funnel. This blog post focuses on each stage of lead generation funnel and how can you build one for your business.

WRITING.TITLE: How to Build an Effective Lead Funnel For Your Business?
WRITING.TEXT: Every business needs customer who is ready to pay the price for your offerings. Marketer spent most of their time in creating lead generation strategies so that leads never stops coming in. They also need to optimize the lead generation funnel by streamlining the whole conversion process.

WRITING.TITLE: Dump The Sales Funnel in Favor of Lifecycle Marketing
WRITING.TEXT: Sales funnel do not provide anything about the buyer. It can't predict their behaviour, mentality and the journey they go through while making the purchase. If we analyse the modern buyer, we find that their behaviour keeps on changing.

WRITING.TITLE: Steps to Build a Digital Marketing Sales Funnel
WRITING.TEXT: Digital marketing sales funnel is a perfect blend of marketing strategies to produce traffic to your business and nurture the leads and turn them into loyal customers who advocate for your business.

WRITING.TITLE: Five benefits of Sales Funnel Marketing
WRITING.TEXT: Sales funnel marketing is a process a customer goes through before they buy a product or service to fully convert into a customer.Sales funnel to represent the online journey of the website visitor before they turn into customers.

WRITING.TITLE: How to Optimize Your B2B Marketing Funnel
WRITING.TEXT: Business and marketing strategies are unique concepts. Optimize B2B marketing funnel process of the marketing funnel is starts with lead generation and followed by the lead nurturing. It ends with converting the lead into a customer.

WRITING.TITLE: What is the effect of Content Marketing in the Marketing Funnel?
WRITING.TEXT: Content marketing has an essential role in the marketing funnel. It is a system that offers information to get leads and place them in a systematic flow of content to turn them into paying customers.

WRITING.TITLE: 5 Stages of Modern Marketing Funnel to Increase Sales in 2020
WRITING.TEXT: 2020 brought new changes in the marketing funnel. The new marketing funnel provider consumer post the beginning of purchase. This becomes necessary as you need your existing customers to keep purchasing from you.

WRITING.TITLE: How B2B Lead Generation Strategies Work For SaaS Companies in 2020?
WRITING.TEXT: B2B lead generation strategies work for SaaS businesses to boost lead generation and return on investment. SaaS Businesses having low annual contract value opt for inbound lead generation strategies. We share some strategies for you.
